DOC.criteria: Diagnosis deQuervain tendinopathy Understands local language willing able follow requirement protocol Understands informed consent sign institutional review board/independent ethic committee ( IRB/IEC ) approve informed consent form Patients allergy lidocaine , celestone , ketorolac , NSAIDS , ASA Patients adverse reaction lidocaine , celestone , ketorolac ( severe elevation blood sugar diabetic cause medical complication ) Patients receive prior steriod injection within past three month Patients prior ipsilateral surgery De ! uervains Tenosyovitis Patients skin lesion location injection ( trauma , eczema , rash ) Patients current infection location injection Patients iontophoresis within three month Patients breast feeding , pregnant , plan become pregnant next six month
